name: Parasites Genocide
description:
This demo project was made 4 years ago in Unity

The goal of the game is to evolve as much as possible by killing enemies and copying their properties (ant legs, mosquito wings etc)

In this demo everything is unlocked, simply stand over the base and press space 

Then click on the terminal on the left side of the base to open the upgrade menu

Each species has a dungeon that can be entered by standing over their dungeon and pressing space.

In each dungeon you can find a boss that you will have to kill

Note:

Game doesn't have an end goal as this is just a little demo
